description: My name is Jona Schlegel and I am a freelance archaeologist based in Vienna, Austria. I specialize in scientific communication, web design, and illustration. I am passionate about creating engaging content that makes science accessible and inclusive. I am here to help you elevate your scientific communication and create a unique experience that aligns with your values and showcases your scientific insights.
